Class
Description
AbstractModule
 
Astra
Abstract base class for Astra plugins that provides core functionality for command management, module registration, and automatic class scanning.
AutoRegisterCommand
Annotation used to automatically register commands in the system.
AutoRegisterModule
Annotation used to mark a class for automatic module registration.
ClassScanner
A utility class for scanning and automatically registering modules and commands.

Example command class demonstrating the usage of the command system.

Example class demonstrating configuration management in the Astra framework.

Example implementation of an economy system as an Astra module.
